Dialogue.Page: Mod: Halcyon Nexus Zero Authors: GameWyrm, Shoe, and Friends
Halcyon Nexus Zero is an upcoming prequel to the original Hearth's Neighbor, taking place in an entirely new system with a handful of planets.
The mod will contain several puzzles and expand the lore for both Hearth's Neighbor mods.
As of writing, the mod is now in hiatus until the lead dev GameWyrm is out of a creative drought and regains the will to mod .
